import React from 'react'; const About = () => { const milestones = [ { year: '1998', event: 'New Summit College established' }, { year: '2005', event: 'Expanded to include IT programs' }, { year: '2010', event: 'New campus building inaugurated' }, { year: '2015', event: 'Achieved university affiliation' }, { year: '2020', event: 'Digital learning platform launched' }, { year: '2024', event: 'Celebrating 25+ years of excellence' } ]; const values = [ { title: 'Excellence', description: 'We strive for the highest standards in education and student development.', icon: 'üèÜ' }, { title: 'Innovation', description: 'We embrace new technologies and teaching methodologies.', icon: 'üí°' }, { title: 'Integrity', description: 'We maintain the highest ethical standards in all our activities.', icon: 'ü§ù' }, { title: 'Inclusivity', description: 'We welcome students from all backgrounds and provide equal opportunities.', icon: 'üåç' } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

About New Summit College

Discover our journey of excellence in education and our commitment to shaping the future leaders of Nepal.

{/* Mission & Vision */}

Our Mission

To provide quality education that empowers students with knowledge, skills, and values necessary for personal growth and professional success. We are committed to fostering critical thinking, creativity, and ethical leadership in our students.

Our Vision

To be recognized as Nepal's premier educational institution, known for academic excellence, innovative teaching methods, and producing graduates who contribute meaningfully to society and the global economy.

{/* History Timeline */}

Our Journey

From humble beginnings to becoming one of Nepal's leading educational institutions.

{milestones.map((milestone, index) => (
{milestone.year}

{milestone.event}

))}
{/* Values */}

Our Values

The core principles that guide everything we do at New Summit College.

{values.map((value, index) => (
{value.icon}

{value.title}

{value.description}

))}
{/* Leadership */}

Leadership Team

Meet the experienced professionals who guide our institution towards excellence.

Dr. Ram Sharma

Principal

Ph.D. in Education Management with 20+ years of experience in academic leadership.

Prof. Sita Poudel

Academic Director

M.Phil. in Computer Science, leading our IT and Science programs with excellence.

Mr. Hari Thapa

Dean of Management

MBA with extensive industry experience in business management and entrepreneurship.

); }; export default About;
